questions.question_text: Which of the following provides the BEST assurance of control effectiveness for security risk scenarios in a service provider’s environment?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Independent assessment report

Selected Answer: A
A. Independent Assessment Report: An independent assessment, such as an audit conducted by a third-party, provides an objective evaluation of the service provider’s controls. This type of assessment is typically comprehensive and is performed by professionals who are trained to identify and evaluate control effectiveness in mitigating security risks. Since it is independent, it is generally considered more reliable than assessments conducted internally by the service provider.

Selected Answer: A
Independent assessment report is better that their self-assessments. Answer for me is A

Selected Answer: C
C. Implement automated IT asset management controls

Selected Answer: C
C. Implement Automated IT Asset Management Controls: This is the most effective option for mitigating risks associated with software licensing noncompliance. Automated IT asset management controls can continuously monitor software installations and usage against licensing agreements. This real-time monitoring and management help ensure compliance, reduce the risk of penalties, and provide alerts for any licensing discrepancies or upcoming renewals.
I believe the answer is C, Automated monitoring can provide timely information rather than conducting a review on an annual basis.

choices.C: Implement automated IT asset management controls
choices.B: Conduct annual reviews of license expiration dates.

questions.question_text: Which of the following BEST enables risk mitigation associated with software licensing noncompliance?
As part of software development projects, risk assessments are MOST effective when performed:

choices.A: throughout the system development life cycle (SDLC).
choices.B: before the decision is made to develop or acquire the software.
choices.D: before developing the project charter for the software.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. throughout the system development life cycle (SDLC).
It is also valid for all kinds of project management. Because projects are subjected to change or new risks can emerge.

Selected Answer: D
D. Engagement of security team early in the systems development life cycle (SDLC)

questions.question_text: Which of the following MOST effectively ensures controls are built into applications during development?

choices.A: Independent post-implementation reviews of system development projects by internal audit
choices.C: Dynamic security testing before applications move to production
choices.D: Engagement of security team early in the systems development life cycle (SDLC)
choices.B: Static code scanning throughout the systems development life cycle (SDLC)
